name: Board Games: Play Ludo & Yatzy
description:
Are you looking for Number of Border games? We present a collection of board games for your iPhone or iPad. It means you can play anytime 9 in 1 game in the All in one Broad game application on iPhone & iPad”

All the classic games to have fun in your spare time. All your favorite Board games in one!

GAME COLLECTION

In this collection of the number of board games you will find 
classic games such as:

Ludo, Word connect, Magic Ball, Tens, Pot Smash, Symmetry, ISTO, Yatzy, Bubble Shooter, Backgammon, Dominoes.

All Board Games FEATURES 

- 9 games in 1
- Completely free games
- Ideal to play in your leisure time
- Games to exercise the mind
- Different levels of difficulty
- For all ages

Ludo  - Ludo is a simpler form of the game Pachisi that originated in ancient India. Ludo is played between 2 to 4 players and you have the option of playing the game against the computer, against your friends. 

Word Connect - Word Connect is an exciting puzzle game for TRUE WORD geniuses! Concentrate to find all hidden words in given letters and connect them anyway you like to catch the word! It starts off as an easy word game and becomes challenging.

Tens - TENS! is an addictive and fun combination of number puzzle, slide puzzle, block-dropping games and block puzzle game with dice.  

pot smash - Pot Smash Puzzle! One of the most addictive game. Do you like shooting and broken Pot Smash sound? Pot Smash is a real shooting game. Broke the Pot Smash within timer by using slingshot. 

Symmetry - Symmetry is a piece puzzle game that requires visualising and thinking before moving, in the quest of discovering all symmetries. Train your brain & improve your visual-spatial ability while playing Symmetry !


ISTO - ISTO Game or Ashta chamma (Ludo) is a board game that involves counters or pieces moved or placed on a pre-marked surface or "board", according to a set of rules. ISTO Game (Ludo) is based on pure strategy, chance, or a mixture of the two, and usually have a goal to turn all 4 coins gold that a player aims to achieve.
Bubble Shooter -  
Bubbles Shooter is the popping bubble game with amazing powers and beautiful graphics. It's best in all jewel, diamond, bubble, gem, ruby, candy, fruit, cube elimination games. Also best in dash, match, crush, rush, blast diamond games. 

All in One Board Games is the place to be if you love Board games. Enjoy your favourite games and try new ones. All your gaming needs in one App.
